column4: Mantice,: I just got done installing Win Xp on a box here at home to do online banking, it took 6 hours between install and updates, installing av and everything else, meanwhile I made 4 vm on another box and upgraded thenm all
You need winxp just for internet banking?
Which bank? Mine goes fine in firefox on linux.
I guess the computer came with it, or you could've raised the $400 cost issue.
